mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_vacation (employee_id, leave_type, start_date, end_date, total_hours, used_hours, remaining_hours, expired_date, notes) VALUES (#{employeeId}, #{leaveType}, #{startDate}, #{endDate}, #{totalHours}, #{usedHours}, #{remainingHours}, #{expiredDate}, #{notes})
mapper.update: UPDATE t_vacation SET employee_id = #{employeeId}, leave_type = #{leaveType}, start_date = #{startDate}, end_date = #{endDate}, total_hours = #{totalHours}, used_hours = #{usedHours}, remaining_hours = #{remainingHours}, expired_date = #{expiredDate}, notes = #{notes} WHERE id = #{id}
